Springfield.Springfield\u2013Beckley Municipal Airpo: Springfield–Beckley Municipal Airport (IATA: SGH, ICAO: KSGH, FAA LID: SGH) is a joint use civil-military airport located five miles (8 km) south of the central business district of Springfield, a city in Clark County, Ohio, United States. It is owned by the city of Springfield. Named after the Beckley family, a member of which knew the Wright Brothers, and witnessed and photographed their first flights.
